thread.title: Watch: Kunal Kemmu dares to do an adult comedy 'Guddu Ki Gun'
thread.title_full: Watch: Kunal Kemmu dares to do an adult comedy 'Guddu Ki Gun'

author: Deccan
title: Watch: Kunal Kemmu dares to do an adult comedy 'Guddu Ki Gun'
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 05, 2015, 19.06 pm Mumbai: After featuring in 'Bhaag Johnny', Kunal Kemmu is back with an adult comedy film 'Guddu Ki Gun'. The actor plays a playboy who works in the guise of a washing powder salesman. Needless to say, Guddu is a hit with the ladies. Thanks to his 'gun' which he fondly refers to as 'khara sona'. However, one fine day, Guddu wakes up to realize that his 'magical gun' has actually turned to gold. He ends up attracting attention from different quarters including the mafia who want to saw off his 'kela'.
The film by director duo Shantanu Ray Chhibber & Sheershak Anand is set to release on October 30. Watch the trailer here and sound off your thoughts in the comments section below.
